Mr Monster Goes To Japan [Chapter 1]: Mr. Monster goes to Japan to fight Gorzilla
Mr. Monster vs. Gorzilla [Chapter 2]: Mr. Monster fights Gorzilla, destroying most of Tokyo in the process
